data.title: Release Packages
data.text:
At Almighty1 Music, we are a fresh forward thinking record label that understands today's market. We offer 4 Release Packages.

Contract Term - 5 Years

Accounted – Monthly within our App.

You will receive a full recording contract.

Pro Release goes live in 2 weeks 70% Artist 30% Label

Accounting App (View Stream Data, Withdraw Money Owed)

Distributed to 240 Territories World Wide.

40 + Streaming Stores.

DJ Download Stores.(Beatport, Itunes, Amazon)

Track(s) fully mastered.

Artwork.

Logo.

Pre-Save Links

Spotify Canvas.

15 Spotify Training Videos... A must-have for any artist.

4,000 Spotify Playlist Curators contact details.

Tips & Guidelines for pitching to Spotify Playlist Curators.

Curators Via Websites list.

Spotify & iTunes Staff contact details.

2,000 DJ email addresses from around the world (Send your tracks directly to DJs)

900 UK Record Label contact details.

All together in an XL spreadsheet.

Added to our Spotify Playlist and YouTube channel.

Uploaded to Tik Tok.

Uploaded to YouTube.

Uploaded to Instagram/Facebook.

Uploaded to Soundcloud.

Total Cost - £35 (One Time Payment To Cover Accounting Costs)

We offer 2 types of playlist packages.

Pro Release + Playlist Package 1.

Genuine Organic Playlist Placements that will drive streams to your track. Don't get scammed into paying for fake services that use bots to gain streams, the numbers will drop off in time and won't pay out Royalties. You also run a real risk of getting your music taken off Spotify and even getting banned as an Artist, not to mention us as a Label and the problems that this kind of fake streaming causes us!

Your song placed on 8 Genuine Playlists with a total of 95,000 followers, 15-30 position for a full 30 days (Your track will stay in the playlist position for the entire time of the campaign).

Total Cost - £110 (One Time payment)

Pro Release + Playlist Package 2.

Official Spotify algorithmic playlists, your track added to Discover Weekly, Release Radar, Daily Mix, On Repeat, Repeat Rewind, and Spotify Radio.

Estimated Streams 10,000 to 30,000.

100% real listeners from algorithmic playlists.

Advanced targeting by music genre.

Advanced targeting by lyrics language.

Advanced targeting by country.

Total Cost - £205 (One Time payment)

Basic Release goes live in 8 weeks 50% Artist 50% Label.

Distributed to 240 Territories World Wide.

40 + Streaming Stores.

DJ Download Stores.(Beatport, Itunes, Amazon,)

Added to our Spotify Playlist and YouTube channel.

Uploaded to Tik Tok.

Uploaded to YouTube.

Uploaded to Instagram/Facebook.

Uploaded to Soundcloud.

Free Release Option

Here you will find samples of Artwork, Audio Reactive Music Visualizers. Static Music Videos, Spotify Canvas and Customised Playlist Pitch.
